title: # RECOMMENDED PRACTICE FOR SEALING OF JOINTS IN CONCRETE PAVEMENTS

main_chapters.title: 1 In cement concrete pavements, the following types of joints are commonly provided:
PAPER bACkING OF COMPRESSIbLE DEbONDING STRIP IS NOT NECESSARY IF THE STRIP IS NON-AbSORbENT TYPE.
JOINTS CAN bE SEALED bY ADOPTING ONE OF THE TWO OPTION OF DEbONDING STRIP/bACkER-ROD AS SHOWN.
DEPENDING UPON THE SEALANT MANUFACTURER’S RECOMMENDATION, THE SIDES OF THE GROOVE MAY HAVE TO bE SAND bLASTED/SAND PAPERED AND PRIMED.
THE GROOVE AND SEALANT DIMENSIONS SHOWN ARE ONLY FOR GUIDANCE.
bACkER ROD/bACk-UP ROD SHALL bE ExPANDED CLOSED-CELL POLYETHYLENE FORM.
ENDS OF THE SEALANT GROOVE SHALL bE PLUGGED bEFORE POURING SEALANT TO AVOID SPILLAGE LATERALLY.
ALL DIMENSIONS ARE IN mm.
PAPER BACKING OF COMPRESSIBLE DEBONDING STRIP IS NOT NECESSARY IF THE STRIP IS NON-ABSORBENT TYPE.
JOINTS CAN BE SEALED BY ADOPTING ONE OF THE TWO OPTIONS OF DEBONDING STRIP/BACKER-ROD AS SHOWN.
DEPENDING UPON THE SEALANT MANUFACTURER’S RECOMMENDATION, THE SIDES OF THE GROOVE MAY HAVE TO BE SAND BLASTED/SAND PAPERED AND PRIMED.
THE GROOVE AND SEALANT DIMENSIONS SHOWN ARE ONLY FOR GUIDANCE.
BACKER ROD/BACK-UP ROD SHALL BE EXPANDED CLOSED-CELL POLYETHYLENE FORM.
ENDS OF THE SEALANT GROOVE SHALL BE PLUGGED BEFORE POURING SEALANT TO AVOID SPILLAGE LATERALLY.
ALL DIMENSIONS ARE IN mm.
PAPER BACKING OF COMPRESSIBLE DEBONDING STRIP IS NOT NECESSARY IF THE STRIP IS NON-ABSORBENT TYPE.
JOINTS CAN BE SEALED BY ADOPTING ONE OF THE TWO OPTIONS OF DEBONDING STRIP/BACKER-ROD AS SHOWN.
DEPENDING UPON THE SEALANT MANUFACTURER’S RECOMMENDATION, THE SIDES OF THE GROOVE MAY HAVE TO BE SAND BLASTED/SAND PAPERED AND PRIMED.
THE GROOVE AND SEALANT DIMENSIONS SHOWN ARE ONLY FOR GUIDANCE.
BACKER ROD/BACK-UP ROD SHALL BE EXPANDED CLOSED-CELL POLYETHYLENE FORM.
ENDS OF THE SEALANT GROOVE SHALL BE PLUGGED BEFORE POURING SEALANT TO AVOID SPILLAGE LATERALLY.
ALL DIMENSIONS ARE IN mm.

Steffes, R and Siljenberg, B J 2003, Early Entry Sawed Portland Cement Concrete Transverse Joint Ends, Iowa Department of Transportation, 800 Lincoln Way Ames, I A United States 50010, The National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine, 500 Fifth Street, NW | Washington, DC 20001

https://www.ussaws.com/early-entry-joint-saw.html

5.title: BACKER ROD/BACK-UP ROD SHALL BE EXPANDED CLOSED-CELL POLYETHYLENE FORM.

1.title: Steffes, R and Siljenberg, B J 2003, Early Entry Sawed Portland Cement Concrete Transverse Joint Ends, Iowa Department of Transportation, 800 Lincoln Way Ames, I A United States 50010, The National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine, 500 Fifth Street, NW | Washington, DC 20001

6.title: ENDS OF THE SEALANT GROOVE SHALL BE PLUGGED BEFORE POURING SEALANT TO AVOID SPILLAGE LATERALLY.

main_chapters: 5: 1 In cement concrete pavements, the following types of joints are commonly provided:
1: PAPER bACkING OF COMPRESSIbLE DEbONDING STRIP IS NOT NECESSARY IF THE STRIP IS NON-AbSORbENT TYPE.
2: JOINTS CAN bE SEALED bY ADOPTING ONE OF THE TWO OPTION OF DEbONDING STRIP/bACkER-ROD AS SHOWN.
3: DEPENDING UPON THE SEALANT MANUFACTURER’S RECOMMENDATION, THE SIDES OF THE GROOVE MAY HAVE TO bE SAND bLASTED/SAND PAPERED AND PRIMED.
4: THE GROOVE AND SEALANT DIMENSIONS SHOWN ARE ONLY FOR GUIDANCE.
5: bACkER ROD/bACk-UP ROD SHALL bE ExPANDED CLOSED-CELL POLYETHYLENE FORM.
6: ENDS OF THE SEALANT GROOVE SHALL bE PLUGGED bEFORE POURING SEALANT TO AVOID SPILLAGE LATERALLY.
7: ALL DIMENSIONS ARE IN mm.
1: PAPER BACKING OF COMPRESSIBLE DEBONDING STRIP IS NOT NECESSARY IF THE STRIP IS NON-ABSORBENT TYPE.
2: JOINTS CAN BE SEALED BY ADOPTING ONE OF THE TWO OPTIONS OF DEBONDING STRIP/BACKER-ROD AS SHOWN.
3: DEPENDING UPON THE SEALANT MANUFACTURER’S RECOMMENDATION, THE SIDES OF THE GROOVE MAY HAVE TO BE SAND BLASTED/SAND PAPERED AND PRIMED.
4: THE GROOVE AND SEALANT DIMENSIONS SHOWN ARE ONLY FOR GUIDANCE.
5: BACKER ROD/BACK-UP ROD SHALL BE EXPANDED CLOSED-CELL POLYETHYLENE FORM.
6: ENDS OF THE SEALANT GROOVE SHALL BE PLUGGED BEFORE POURING SEALANT TO AVOID SPILLAGE LATERALLY.
7: ALL DIMENSIONS ARE IN mm.

2: JOINTS CAN BE SEALED BY ADOPTING ONE OF THE TWO OPTIONS OF DEBONDING STRIP/BACKER-ROD AS SHOWN.
